title: Recycled Thermoplastics Market Size to Reach USD 145.34 Bn by 2034
description: According to Towards Chemical and Materials the recycled thermoplastics market is projected to grow from USD 63.43 bn in 2025 to USD 145.34 bn by 2034...
content:
Ottawa, Dec. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The global recycled thermoplastics market size
